Alternate Title: Let's take care of the poultry. I am a fine war chicken. I eat little and produce a lot.
Creator: Douanne, G., artist
Description: Poster showing a black hen sitting on top of a large pile of eggs.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
